translate.english: attach great importance to / value highly

examples.example: 我们应该重视环境保护，为子孙后代创造美好的家园。

translate.english: We should attach great importance to environmental protection and create a beautiful homeland for future generations.

examples.example: 我们要重视自己的身体健康，才能更好地享受生活。

translate.english: We should attach great importance to our own physical health in order to better enjoy life.

examples.example: 我们要重视每一个提升自己的机会，努力让自己变得更加优秀。

translate.english: We should attach great importance to every opportunity to improve ourselves and strive to make ourselves more excellent.
